info.title: Swagger Json
info.description: This is a generated swagger json for your sails project

name.description: The name of the delivery method.

description.description: A brief description of the shipping method.

priceModifier.description: A positive or negative integer representing the amount of pence to adjust the base price by.

postCodeRestrictionRegex.description: A regular expression specifying which postcodes are eligible for this delivery method.

bufferLength.description: The required buffer time before booking a slot.

maxOrders.description: The maximum number of orders allowed per slot.

vendor.description: JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

openingHours.description: Array of **openinghours**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

specialDate.description: Specific date override - for example Christmas day

fulfilmentMethod.description: JSON dictionary representing the **fulfilmentmethod** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

orderedDateTime.description: The unixtime when the order was placed.

paidDateTime.description: The unixtime when the order payment was confirmed (if at all).

deliveryPhoneNumber.description: The phone number for the delivery.

deliveryAddressLineOne.description: The first line of the delivery address.

deliveryAddressLineTwo.description: The second line of the delivery address.

deliveryAddressPostCode.description: The post code of the delivery address.

deliveryAddressInstructions.description: Details about how/where to deliver the order.

customerWalletAddress.description: The wallet address of the customer.

deliveryId.description: The ID to identify the delivery in the logistics system

fulfilmentSlotFrom.description: The beginning of the estimated fulfilment slot.

fulfilmentSlotTo.description: The end of the estimated fulfilment slot.

fulfilmentMethod.description: JSON dictionary representing the **fulfilmentmethod** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

discount.description: JSON dictionary representing the **discount** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

items.description: Array of **orderitem**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

vendor.description: JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

order.description: The order to which the item belongs JSON dictionary representing the **order** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

product.description: The product which has been ordered. JSON dictionary representing the **product** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

optionValues.description: Array of **orderitemoptionvalue**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

option.description: JSON dictionary representing the **productoption** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

optionValue.description: JSON dictionary representing the **productoptionvalue** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

orderItem.description: JSON dictionary representing the **orderitem** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

basePrice.description: Base product price in pence. This can be modified by product options or delivery methods.

image.description: Full path to the product image.

isAvailable.description: Boolean to represent whether the product is available or not.

priority.description: Temporary way to store priority of products

vendor.description: The seller of the product. JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

options.description: A collection of options that apply to the product (i.e. colour). Array of **productoption**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

category.description: The category of the product. JSON dictionary representing the **productcategory** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: The name of the product category.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the product category image.

vendor.description: The category owner. JSON dictionary representing the **vendor** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

products.description: Array of **product**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: Name of the product options, for example "colour".

product.description: The product for which the option applies. JSON dictionary representing the **product** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

values.description: The values that can be chosen for this option (i.e. blue, green) Array of **productoptionvalue**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: The name of the option value (e.g. Blue)

description.description: The description of the option value (e.g. This is a great sky blue shade!)

priceModifier.description: The amount of pence to add or subtract from the product total for this option.

isAvailable.description: Represents whether or not the option value is available.

option.description: The option to which this value can apply. JSON dictionary representing the **productoption** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

description.description: A brief description of the vendor.

walletAddress.description: The blockchain wallet address for the vendor. Used to distribute payments from customers.

imageFd.description: A description of where the featured image file can be found

imageMime.description: The mime type of the featured image

deliveryRestrictionDetails.description: This is a free text description of the restaurant's restrictions, used temporarily.

products.description: Array of **product**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

collectionFulfilmentMethod.description: JSON dictionary representing the **fulfilmentmethod** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

deliveryFulfilmentMethod.description: JSON dictionary representing the **fulfilmentmethod** instance or FK when creating / updating / not populated

vendorCategories.description: Array of **vendorcategory**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

productCategories.description: Array of **productcategory**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

name.description: The name of the product category.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the product category image.

vendors.description: Array of **vendor**'s or array of FK's when creating / updating / not populated

AttributeFilterParam.description: To filter results based on a particular attribute, specify a query parameter with the same name as the attribute defined on your model. For instance, if our `Purchase` model has an `amount` attribute, we could send `GET /purchase?amount=99.99` to return a list of $99.99 purchases.

WhereQueryParam.name: where
WhereQueryParam.description:
Instead of filtering based on a specific attribute, you may instead choose to provide a `where` parameter with the WHERE piece of a [Waterline criteria](https://sailsjs.com/documentation/concepts/models-and-orm/query-language), _encoded as a JSON string_. This allows you to take advantage of `contains`, `startsWith`, and other sub-attribute criteria modifiers for more powerful `find()` queries.

e.g. `?where={"name":{"contains":"theodore"}}`

LimitQueryParam.name: limit
LimitQueryParam.description: The maximum number of records to send back (useful for pagination). Defaults to 30.

SkipQueryParam.name: skip
SkipQueryParam.description: The number of records to skip (useful for pagination).

SortQueryParam.name: sort
SortQueryParam.description:
The sort order. By default, returned records are sorted by primary key value in ascending order.

e.g. `?sort=lastName%20ASC`

post.description: This action is responsible for the creation of new orders.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: Cart items from the frontend, which include the product id and corresponding options.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description: The total order value, including shipping.

404.description: There is no product with that ID!

get.description: Get the options for the product as well as the relevant options.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product that we want the options for.

get.description: Checks the validity of the discount code and, if valid, returns the details.
